title: Hey Poor Podcast Episode 42: Super Nintendo President Maker
content:
Jay Petrequin, Francis DiPersio, Adam Foster and Gary Swallow discuss the hiring of Nintendo's new company president, as well as digging in to Mario Maker and Destiny: The Taken…
